___upload_url.description: The direct CDN URL of the attachment uploaded with a note
___upload_url.title: Upload url

___ts_added.description: The unix timestamp when the note was added
___ts_added.title: TS Added

___upload_extension.description: The extension of the attachment ('pdf', 'csv' etc)
___upload_extension.title: Upload Extension

___note_id.description: the id of the note in the system
___note_id.title: Note ID

___upload_id.description: The unique and randomly generated ID of the file attachment that is associated with this note
___upload_id.title: Upload ID
